channel.title: Need ipban to work
channel.description: I found one in one of these posts, but it only worked first time, then when i tried to restart server it rejected everyone's ip and no one could go on server until i changed it back, the person told me to change something in the server.java file, and i did.

item.title: Need ipban to work
item.dc:creator: @Wildcat_240 Wildcat_240
item.description:
@Wildcat_240 wrote:

The person that told you to change server.java was wrong…Just find the person’s ip, and put it in the “bannedip” file.

Read full topic
